articles.description: Three of the Everton goalkeeper’s finest saves for England in Qatar have gone unnoticed by the match officials as international football continues to bring out the best in him
articles.content: As a measure of how much Jordan Pickfords performances have flown under the radar during this World Cup, it turns out the England goalkeeper is so underrated that three of his best saves havent even … [+5645 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Preece, John Townley
articles.title: What Unai Emery shouted at Ollie Watkins as Douglas Luiz transfer point made - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Here’s the talking points as Aston Villa play out a 2-2 draw with Brighton in Dubai with Danny Ings back amongst the goals while Unai Emery will know there's plenty to work on with Chelsea up next in Abu Dhabi on Sunday (December 11)
articles.content: Aston Villa were cruising but conceded two goals inside eight minutes before a late Lewis Dunk own-goal made it all square in their first friendly in Dubai. Danny Ings put Villa ahead just seconds af… [+5784 chars]
